title: Newbie Software help; Using Suitcase/fusion: would like to print font sample "book"
content:
Hello, would anyone know how to print a font sample “booklet” from my font collection in suitcase/fusion? I would like a quick reference “booklet” to show clients so they can browse font choices.  
Anyone know how -to or can point me in the right direction? Haven’t got a response from the extenis forums yet. Thanks so much , in advance.

 [‹ custom fonts: types of licenses](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929040424/http:/typophile.com/node/28417 "Go to previous forum topic") [Going to NYC ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929040424/http:/typophile.com/node/28529 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sundance

comments.content:
In Fusion, sample pages are printed through File \> Print Sample pages. If you need more control, you might want to check out Font Vista from Morrison Softdesign.

[http://www.morrisonsoftdesign.com/index-10.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929040424/http:/www.morrisonsoftdesign.com/index-10.html "http://www.morrisonsoftdesign.com/index-10.html")
